english:
üìú *TOLC Exam Solver Bot: Quick Answers, Straight from the Source!* üìú

Ready to conquer the TOLC? Our bot is here to help you get the answers you need, fast! Just follow these simple guidelines:

*Submitting Questions:*

1. *Best Way: Snap a Pic!* üì∏ 
    ‚úÖ Taking a photo of your question is the most effective way to ensure accurate processing. It's like showing the bot the exact question from your exam.

2. *Okay Way: Type it Out* ‚å®Ô∏è 
    ‚úÖ If you need to type your question, please be sure to enter it *exactly* as it appears on the test, including all symbols and special characters.

*Reading Comprehension Questions:*

1. *The Passage:* 
    ‚úÖ First, send a clear photo of the entire reading comprehension passage. Write "text" in the image caption. This will save the passage for your questions.

2. *The Questions:* 
    ‚úÖ *After* sending the passage, send your questions *one at a time* as separate messages. Write "question" in the image caption of each question.

*Using the Bot:*

1. *Answer Format:* The bot will provide the correct answer (A, B, C, D, or E) for each question you submit.

2. *One Question at a Time:* Please wait for the bot to finish processing your current question before sending the next one.

3. *Private Access:* This bot is private and only accessible to authorized users.

4. *Respect the System:* Avoid sending excessive requests or attempting to misuse the bot. Abuse will result in a ban.

Ready to get started? Contact @teqstura or @kklersx *immediately* in case of technical issues! Good luck with your TOLC! üëç

üîπ Now send a question!
uzbek:
üìú *TOLC Imtihon Yechish Boti: Tezkor Javoblar, Manbadan To'g'ri!* üìú

TOLCni zabt etishga tayyormisiz? Botimiz sizga kerakli javoblarni tezda olishga yordam berish uchun shu yerda! Shunchaki ushbu oddiy ko'rsatmalarga rioya qiling:

*Savollarni Yuborish:*

1. *Eng Yaxshi Yo'l: Rasmga Oling!* üì∏ 
    ‚úÖ Savolingizning fotosuratini olish aniq ishlashni ta'minlashning eng samarali usuli hisoblanadi. Bu botga imtihoningizdagi aniq savolni ko'rsatishga o'xshaydi.

2. *Yaxshi Yo'l: Yozing* ‚å®Ô∏è 
    ‚úÖ Agar savolingizni yozishingiz kerak bo'lsa, iltimos, uni testda ko'rinib turganidek, barcha belgilar va maxsus belgilarni kiritgan holda *aniq* kiritishga ishonch hosil qiling.

*¬´Reading Comprehension¬ª Savollari:*

1. *Matn:* 
    ‚úÖ Avval, o'qish uchun berilgan butun matnning aniq fotosuratini yuboring. Rasm sarlavhasiga "text" deb yozing. Bu matnni savollaringiz uchun saqlab qo'yadi.

2. *Savollar:* 
    ‚úÖ *Matnni* yuborganingizdan *keyin*, savollaringizni *bitta-bitta* alohida xabarlar sifatida yuboring. Har bir savol rasmi sarlavhasiga "question" deb yozing.

*Botdan Foydalanish:*

1. *Javob Formati:* Bot siz yuborgan har bir savol uchun to'g'ri javobni (A, B, C, D yoki E) taqdim etadi.

2. *Bir Vaqtning O'zida Bitta Savol:* Iltimos, bot joriy savolingizni ishlashni tugatishini kutib turing, keyingisini yuborishdan oldin.

3. *Shaxsiy Kirish:* Ushbu bot shaxsiy va faqat vakolatli foydalanuvchilar uchun mavjud.

4. *Sistemani Hurmat Qiling:* Haddan tashqari ko'p so'rovlar yuborishdan yoki botni noto'g'ri ishlatishga urinishdan saqlaning. Suiiste'mol qilish banga olib keladi.

Boshlashga tayyormisiz? Texnik muammolar yuzaga kelganda @teqstura yoki @kklersx bilan *darhol* bog'laning! TOLCda omad tilaymiz! üëç

üîπ Endi savol yuboring!
